title: "AWS Inferentia2 builds on AWS Inferentia1 by delivering 4x higher throughput and 10x lower latency"
excerpt: "The size of the machine learning (ML) models––large language models (LLMs) and foundation models (FMs)––is growing fast year-over-year, and these models need faster and more powerful accelerators, especially for generative AI. AWS Inferentia2 was designed from the ground up to deliver higher performance"
